fields.name: Whiskey Sour
fields.description: A classic sour cocktail with whiskey, lemon juice, and sugar.
fields.ingrediens: Whiskey, Lemon Juice, Sugar, Egg White
fields.instructon: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a glass.

fields.name: Margarita
fields.description: A refreshing tequila-based cocktail with lime and triple sec.
fields.ingrediens: Tequila, Lime Juice, Triple Sec, Salt
fields.instructon: Shake with ice and serve in a salt-rimmed glass.

fields.name: Mojito
fields.description: A refreshing rum-based cocktail with mint and lime.
fields.ingrediens: Rum, Mint, Lime, Sugar, Soda Water
fields.instructon: Muddle mint and sugar, add rum, lime juice, and soda water.

fields.name: Piña Colada
fields.description: A sweet tropical cocktail with rum, coconut, and pineapple.
fields.instructon: Blend all ingredients with ice until smooth.

fields.name: Cosmopolitan
fields.description: A stylish vodka cocktail with cranberry and lime.
fields.ingrediens: Vodka, Triple Sec, Cranberry Juice, Lime Juice
fields.instructon: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass.

fields.name: Negroni
fields.description: A bitter Italian cocktail with gin, vermouth, and Campari.
fields.instructon: Stir all ingredients with ice and serve over ice.

fields.name: Daiquiri
fields.description: A simple and tart rum-based cocktail with lime.
fields.instructon: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a glass.

fields.name: Martini
fields.description: A classic gin or vodka cocktail with vermouth, served with an olive.
fields.instructon: Stir or shake with ice and serve in a martini glass.

fields.name: Long Island Iced Tea
fields.description: A potent mix of vodka, tequila, rum, gin, and triple sec.
fields.ingrediens: Vodka, Tequila, Rum, Gin, Triple Sec, Cola
fields.instructon: Shake all ingredients except cola and serve with ice, top with cola.

fields.name: Bloody Mary
fields.description: A savory cocktail with vodka, tomato juice, and spices.
fields.ingrediens: Vodka, Tomato Juice, Lemon Juice, Worcestershire Sauce, Tabasco
fields.instructon: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a glass, garnish with celery.

fields.name: Mai Tai
fields.description: A fruity rum cocktail with lime and orange liqueur.
fields.ingrediens: Light Rum, Dark Rum, Lime Juice, Orange Curaçao, Orgeat Syrup
fields.instructon: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a glass with ice.

fields.name: Old Fashioned
fields.description: A timeless cocktail with whiskey, sugar, and bitters.
fields.instructon: Muddle sugar and bitters, add whiskey and ice, stir gently.

fields.name: Mint Julep
fields.description: A Southern classic with bourbon and fresh mint.
fields.instructon: Muddle mint and sugar, add bourbon and crushed ice, stir well.

fields.name: Aperol Spritz
fields.description: A bubbly Italian aperitif with Aperol and prosecco.
fields.ingrediens: Aperol, Prosecco, Soda Water, Orange Slice
fields.instructon: Pour over ice, top with prosecco and soda, garnish with orange.

fields.name: Caipirinha
fields.description: A Brazilian cocktail with cachaça, lime, and sugar.
fields.instructon: Muddle lime and sugar, add cachaça and ice, stir gently.

fields.name: Gin Fizz
fields.description: A light and fizzy gin cocktail with lemon.
fields.ingrediens: Gin, Lemon Juice, Sugar, Soda Water
fields.instructon: Shake gin, lemon, and sugar, then top with soda in a glass.

fields.name: French 75
fields.description: A sparkling gin cocktail with lemon and champagne.
fields.instructon: Shake gin, lemon juice and sugar, top with champagne.

fields.name: White Russian
fields.description: A creamy cocktail with vodka, coffee liqueur, and cream.
fields.instructon: Pour ingredients over ice and stir gently.

fields.name: Amaretto Sour
fields.description: A sweet and nutty cocktail with a tangy twist.
fields.instructon: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a glass.
